name: forest trail headband
notes:
**forest trail crochet headband**

this cosy crochet headband pattern is just perfect for those in-between days when you're not sure if you'll need a hat or not. you'll be able to keep your ears warm out on the trail, but won't have to risk getting "hat-hair" to achieve it.

i love the texture in this headband that comes from the front post double crochet stitches. (the pattern includes a short photo tutorial on where to position the fpdcs)

**construction**
this crochet headband is worked from side to side. i love this method for making headbands because you can just keep adding rows until you have reached the circumference that you want. so, you pretty much eliminate any risk of the headband not fitting :-)
